= Model formats used in rtm-ros-robotics =
== Euslisp (xx.l)
   Euslisp model format (irteus version) used in Euslisp process. 
   Supported : robots, objects, and scenes
== Collada (xx.dae)
   Collada model format used in some ros nodes (such as rviz) and OpenRAVE
   Supported : robots, objects, and scenes
== VRML (xx.wrl)
   VRML model format used in OpenHRP3 system. 
   Supported : robots and objects. scenes are supported as Project File (xx.xml)
   Note that OpenHRP3 VRML format differs from webots VRML format.
